Message.Title: If I see anyone wearing Google privacy invasion glasses,
Message.Msg: I will either punch them in the glasses or tell them to look at someone else because I don't want them stealing images of my and my family and kids. They should be called the ultimate PERVERT Glasses. Bathroom recording, you name it. Some will not even know what they are.

Message.Title: US government doesn't allow cameras around their facilities so if you are caught your spy pervert glasses will be confiscated.
Message.Msg: As a photographer, I know this. You cannot point a camera at many Government installations without security approaching you and checking to see if you took pictures and then making you delete the photos. You really think they are going to let Google glass wearers walk around recording them all day long. They will especially be looking out for GG wearers. "Welcome to a world through Glass. It's surprisingly simple. Say “take a picture” to take a picture. Record what you see. Hands-free. Even share what you see." Complete invasion of privacy which Google the communist organization loves to do. Be warned, Google is the beast.

Message.Title: Google Glass...perfect for Perves!! ""Welcome to a world through Glass. It's surprisingly simple. Say “take a picture” to take a picture
Message.Msg: "Welcome to a world through Glass. It's surprisingly simple. Say “take a picture” to take a picture. Record what you see. Hands-free. Even share what you see." Perves are going to love this. Child molesters can just look at your kids and record them for future reference and kidnapping. Are we going to allow this? HELLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL NOOOOOOOO!

Message.Title: On Monday at $839 I posted..Sell into Strength
Message.Msg: It was then I posted that GOOG's earnings report had more holes in it than my socks and the HEDGE FUNDS can take it down at any time. I used AAPl as an example,. AAPL missed slightly due to a shorten quarter and it was taken down by $120. Then on Tuesday, Oppenheimer said "GOOG may miss revenues by 3%. Money has been LEAVING since. I neer said to short this or any stock

Message.Title: Shockwave Instability, Privacy
Message.Msg: I've never been able to resolve the chrome shockwave instability issue for more than 48 hours. Also, I value my privacy. Therefore, I would not consider buying a Chrome computer.

Message.Title: I predict google will be at 500 or lower by this time next year. It is a 100% definite bubble
Message.Msg: In my opinion as soon as a business determines that there is a better way to advertise than google that is cheaper google's bubble will be deflated rapidly. It will drop 100's of point in weeks. Let's see as anyone that has been at the top of google sold shares? The reason they are worried is Nokia's relationship with Microsoft and they know what Nokia's mapping services are capable of. Nokia has already made a better phone and the gps maps are in a league by themselves. Use the gps locator and Nokia's maps will scare you because your exact position is found on the map. Google's you may be on the same block at least. Nokia's maps work offline as well. Nokia has landed contracts with Major auto manufacturers for vehicle navigation systems with bing map and advanced searches that promote businesses in searches. The plans for the map search is a direct threat to google. The only way google make's money is from click fraud by business competitors. The month that businesses are no longer prisoners of google advertising and have a better, cheaper, fairer method of advertising google is not only a bubble they are history. Think I am wrong, ask any business owner. The entire google echo system (all the #$%$ & more #$%$) is paid for by click advertising profits. The majority of that is some clown repeatedly clicking on a business competitors ads. So google has become rich because there are so many people in the world that want to screw their competitors by clicking on their competitors ads and they get charged 50 cents to several dollars every time they get a click from a competitor. Guess what, when a business complains to their sales rep guess what happens (nothing). Business that are subjects of click fraud will stop advertising within a NY minute as soon as the next advertising thing comes. So maybe you need to see when it is coming. Trust me the google empire is a bubble filled with click fraud that is ending soon.

Message.Msg: So take your fanboy axxes over to Nokia and buy the next leader.

Message.Title: GOOG mini options begin trading on Monday
Message.Msg: Has anyone received any info from your broker about the commission being charged for trading these mini options? It was announced in the news that for now, brokers will not be charged for trading these options by the exchanges in order to promote them. If the brokers could pass the savings on to the trader, these new options would be a great way to daytrade GOOG.

Message.Title: This will make your day
Message.Msg: Revenues approximately doubled last year as did earnings and expected again this year. Perfect size company w/ only 600 mil sales. It has a p/e of 22 and should have one of 40 just to get to the price of a typical fast growing company. Not only should the price rise for a higher p/e but also it should rocket up with the expected fast rise in earnings. We could easily see the price triple in one year considering these items. The SYMBOL: (AL) - a high profit airline leasing business. Company has billions of dollars in new jets ordered from Boeing and Airbus so obviously they expect a lot more business. I have 20 years experience evaluating hundreds of companies, this is one of the top 3 company stocks I have ever found. The company reported great earnings again and also leased 2 - Boeing 777's, and ordered 10 more Boeing 777's. Symbol (AL) Another interesting but more speculative stock is (edap). The company is big into ultrasound and they finished a study showing ultrasound works on prostate cancer without side effects like chemotherapy. The company is applying for approval with the FDA and it is expected to go through on a fast track because of the excellent results. This undiscovered company is priced at only $4.
